definition: all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all

sentences.english: The site of the Forbidden City was situated on the Imperial City during the Mongol Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 紫禁城原本位於蒙元時期的都城。

sentences.english: It began in the forest of childhood , and ceased at the city of success.
sentences.chinese: 此途開始於童年的森林，已成功的都城爲終點。

sentences.english: The mausoleum was built in imitation of the Qin Dynasty's capital, Xianyang.
sentences.chinese: 這陵園是仿照秦代都城咸陽建造的。

sentences.english: At the time of writing, the capital of the Tang Dynasty, Chang'an, was already captured by rebel forces.
sentences.chinese: 寫這首詩時，唐代的都城長安已經被叛軍佔領。

sentences.english: This is the south gate of the Ming capital.
sentences.chinese: 這座門樓是明朝都城的正南門。

sentences.english: It means the ruins of the Shang Dynasty's capital.
sentences.chinese: 殷墟啊就是指商朝都城的遺址。

sentences.english: That caused the ruin of his capital.
sentences.chinese: 這就是他的都城變成廢墟的原因。

sentences.english: Click to see more photos of City Sigtseeing Metrobuses in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 按圖前往披上了其他城市色彩的都城巴士的相片。

sentences.english: Poseida was also the capital city of the island, and was called the Emerald City.
sentences.chinese: 波塞迪亞也是該島的都城，被稱作翡翠城。

sentences.english: According to the ancient document the city may be the capital of the early Xia dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 根據文獻記載，該遺址應是夏代早期都城夏邑所在。

sentences.english: The city was the capital of China during the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 這座城市曾是中國唐朝時的都城。

sentences.english: These female horse displayed in lu r. music this place.
sentences.chinese: 這些女樂文馬陳列在魯國都城南面高門這個地方。

sentences.english: One year, the State of Qin sent troops to attack Zhao and surrounded the capital of Handan.
sentences.chinese: 有一年，秦國出兵攻打趙國，並已經包圍了都城邯鄲。

sentences.english: According to the tradition, Ping Yang (present Lin Fen of Shanxi Province) Was Yao's capital.
sentences.chinese: 今山西臨汾，古稱平陽，相傳是帝堯的都城。

sentences.english: As the capital of the Han Dynasty, Changan City played animportant role in the history of Chinese ancient capitals.
sentences.chinese: 漢都長安在中國古代都城史上佔有重要地位。

sentences.english: The choice of Erlitou Site went through careful consideration.
sentences.chinese: 二里頭都城的選址經過了周密的考慮。

definition: Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center
old name for Beijing 北京[Bei3 jing1]
Dacheng county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei/Tacheng township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan

Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)
old name of Kaifeng 開封|开封[Kai1 feng1]
Haojing (in modern Shaanxi, northwest of Chang'an county), capital of Western Zhou from c. 1050 BC
